issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Provide Dataset writing to IPC format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7824](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7824). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Begin with writing to IPC format since it is simpler than parquet and to efficiently support the "locally cached extract" workflow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7824?focusedCommentId=17062759) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
